title: Dabbu Files Resource
description: A file/folder stored by the user with a certain provider

path.description: The absolute path to the resource within the provider's heirarchy

kind.description: The kind of resource (file or folder)

provider.description: The ID of the provider with which the resource was stored

mimeType.description: The mime type of the file's contents

size.description: The size of the file in bytes

createdAtTime.description: The time the file was created

lastModifiedTime.description: The time the file was last modified (not accessed)

contentURI.description: The content URI to view/download the file
